verses.verse: And he <S%G1684>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G4143>ship,<s%> and <S%G1276>passed<s%> <S%G1276>over,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4172>city.<s%>

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> they <S%G4374>brought<s%> to him a man <S%G3885>sick<s%> of the <S%G3885>palsy,<s%> <S%G906>lying<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> a <S%G2825>bed:<s%> and <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>seeing<s%> their <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G4483>said<s%> to the <S%G3885>sick<s%> of the <S%G3885>palsy;<s%> <S%G5043>Son,<s%> be of good <S%G2293>cheer;<s%> your <S%G266>sins<s%> be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> you.
And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> of the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G4483>said<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> man <S%G987>blasphemes.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> their <S%G1761>thoughts<s%> <S%G4483>said,<s%> Why <S%G2443><s%> <S%G5101><s%> <S%G1760>think<s%> you <S%G4190>evil<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> hearts? <S%G2588><s%>

For <S%G5101>whether<s%> is <S%G2123>easier,<s%> to say, <S%G2036><s%> Your <S%G266>sins<s%> be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> you; <S%G2228>or<s%> to <S%G2036>say,<s%> <S%G1453>Arise,<s%> and walk? <S%G4043><s%>

But that you may <S%G1492>know<s%> that the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> to <S%G863>forgive<s%> sins, <S%G266><s%> <S%G5119>(then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> he to the <S%G3885>sick<s%> of the <S%G3885>palsy,<s%>) <S%G1453>Arise,<s%> <S%G142>take<s%> up your <S%G2825>bed,<s%> and <S%G5217>go<s%> to <S%G4675>your<s%> house. <S%G3624><s%>
And he <S%G1453>arose,<s%> and <S%G565>departed<s%> to his <S%G3624>house.<s%>

But when the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, they <S%G2296>marveled,<s%> and <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> had <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G444>men.<s%>

And as <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3855>passed<s%> <S%G3855>forth<s%> from <S%G1564>there,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G3004>named<s%> <S%G3156>Matthew,<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G5058>receipt<s%> of <S%G5058>custom:<s%> and he <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G190>Follow<s%> me . And he <S%G450>arose,<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> him.

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, as <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G345>sat<s%> <S%G345>at<s%> meat in the <S%G3614>house,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5057>publicans<s%> and <S%G268>sinners<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G4873>sat<s%> <S%G347>down<s%> with him and his <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>

And when the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, they <S%G4483>said<s%> to his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G1302>Why<s%> <S%G2068>eats<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1320>Master<s%> with <S%G5057>publicans<s%> and <S%G268>sinners?<s%>

But when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that, he <S%G4483>said<s%> to them, They that be <S%G2480>whole<s%> need <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5532><s%> not a <S%G2395>physician,<s%> but they that are sick. <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2560><s%>

But <S%G4198>go<s%> you and <S%G3129>learn<s%> what <S%G5101><s%> that <S%G2076>means,<s%> I <S%G2309>will<s%> have <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> and not <S%G2378>sacrifice:<s%> for I am not <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G2564>call<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> but <S%G268>sinners<s%> to repentance. <S%G3341><s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to him the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> of <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1302>Why<s%> do we and the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3522>fast<s%> <S%G4183>oft,<s%> but your <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3522>fast<s%> not?

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4483>said<s%> to them, <S%G1410>Can<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of the bridal <S%G3567>chamber<s%> <S%G3996>mourn,<s%> as <S%G1909>long<s%> as the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%> is with them? but the <S%G2250>days<s%> will <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%> shall be <S%G522>taken<s%> from them, and <S%G5119>then<s%> shall they fast. <S%G3522><s%>

<S%G3762>No<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1911>puts<s%> a <S%G1915>piece<s%> of <S%G46>new<s%> <S%G4470>cloth<s%> to an <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G2440>garment,<s%> for that which is put in to <S%G4138>fill<s%> it up <S%G142>takes<s%> from the <S%G2440>garment,<s%> and the <S%G4978>rent<s%> is <S%G1096>made<s%> worse. <S%G5501><s%>

<S%G3761>Neither<s%> do men <S%G906>put<s%> <S%G3501>new<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G779>bottles:<s%> <S%G1490>else<s%> the <S%G779>bottles<s%> <S%G4486>break,<s%> and the <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G1632>runs<s%> out, and the <S%G779>bottles<s%> <S%G622>perish:<s%> but they <S%G906>put<s%> <S%G3501>new<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G779>bottles,<s%> and <S%G297>both<s%> are preserved. <S%G4933><s%>

While he <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things to them, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there <S%G2064>came<s%> a certain <S%G758>ruler,<s%> and <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> My <S%G2364>daughter<s%> is <S%G737>even<s%> <S%G737>now<s%> <S%G5053>dead:<s%> but <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G2007>lay<s%> your <S%G5495>hand<s%> on her, and she shall <S%G2198>live.<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1453>arose,<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> him, and so did his <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G1135>woman,<s%> which was diseased with an <S%G131>issue<s%> of <S%G131>blood<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2094>years,<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> <S%G3693>behind<s%> him, and <S%G680>touched<s%> the <S%G2899>hem<s%> of his <S%G2440>garment:<s%>
For she <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>herself,<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> I may but <S%G680>touch<s%> his <S%G2440>garment,<s%> I shall be <S%G4982>whole.<s%>

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1994>turned<s%> him <S%G1994>about,<s%> and when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> her, he <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2364>Daughter,<s%> be of good <S%G2293>comfort;<s%> your <S%G4102>faith<s%> has <S%G4982>made<s%> you <S%G4982>whole.<s%> And the <S%G1135>woman<s%> was <S%G4982>made<s%> <S%G4982>whole<s%> from that <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

And when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G758>ruler's<s%> <S%G3614>house,<s%> and <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G834>minstrels<s%> and the <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G2350>making<s%> a <S%G2350>noise,<s%>
He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G402>Give<s%> <S%G402>place:<s%> for the <S%G2877>maid<s%> is not <S%G599>dead,<s%> but sleeps. <S%G2518><s%> And they <S%G2606>laughed<s%> him to <S%G2606>scorn.<s%>

But <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G3793>people<s%> were <S%G1544>put<s%> <S%G1544>forth,<s%> he <S%G1525>went<s%> in, and <S%G2902>took<s%> her by the <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and the <S%G2877>maid<s%> <S%G1453>arose.<s%>
And the <S%G5345>fame<s%> <S%G3778>hereof<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>abroad<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> that <S%G1093>land.<s%>

And when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3855>departed<s%> <S%G1564>there,<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5185>blind<s%> men <S%G190>followed<s%> him, <S%G2896>crying,<s%> and <S%G3004>saying,<s%> You <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1138>David,<s%> have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on us.

And when he was <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3614>house,<s%> the <S%G5185>blind<s%> men <S%G4334>came<s%> to him: and <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G4100>Believe<s%> you that I am <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> this? <S%G5124><s%> They <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3483>Yes,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G680>touched<s%> he their <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2596>According<s%> to <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> be it to you.

And their <S%G3788>eyes<s%> were <S%G455>opened;<s%> and <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> straightly <S%G1690>charged<s%> them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> See <S%G3708><s%> that <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> know <S%G1097><s%> it.
But they, when they were <S%G1831>departed,<s%> <S%G1310>spread<s%> <S%G1310>abroad<s%> his <S%G1310>fame<s%> in <S%G3650>all<s%> that <S%G1093>country.<s%>
As they <S%G1831>went<s%> out, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> they <S%G4374>brought<s%> to him a <S%G2974>dumb<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1139>possessed<s%> with a <S%G1139>devil.<s%>

And when the <S%G1140>devil<s%> was <S%G1544>cast<s%> out, the <S%G2974>dumb<s%> <S%G2980>spoke:<s%> and the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G2296>marveled,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> It was <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5316>seen<s%> in <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>
But the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> He <S%G1544>casts<s%> out <S%G1140>devils<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G758>prince<s%> of the <S%G1140>devils.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4013>went<s%> <S%G4013>about<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%> and <S%G2968>villages,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> in their <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> and <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> and <S%G2323>healing<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3554>sickness<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3119>disease<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2992>people.<s%>

But when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes,<s%> he was <S%G4697>moved<s%> with <S%G4697>compassion<s%> <S%G4012>on<s%> them, <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G1590>fainted,<s%> and were <S%G4496>scattered<s%> <S%G4496>abroad,<s%> as <S%G4263>sheep<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4166>shepherd.<s%>
<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> he to his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> The <S%G2326>harvest<s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> is <S%G4183>plenteous,<s%> but the laborers <S%G2040><s%> are few; <S%G3641><s%>

<S%G1189>Pray<s%> you <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of the <S%G2326>harvest,<s%> that he will <S%G1544>send<s%> <S%G1544>forth<s%> <S%G2040>laborers<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> his harvest. <S%G2326><s%>
